Articles.Content:
hello everyone!

I have been playing ksp since 0.21 and now at 0.22 I feel like I might have some input for this great community.

i will be posting a thread in the general section that details how my career mode has gone, how I completed the tech tree and what I've done afterwards. tons of screenshots to accompany it.

anyway...love ksp!!

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to see you've been enjoying the game so far. It's great to see how the game can bring people together to share what they've learned and experienced.

Make yourself at home, and don't be afraid to ask questions or join discussions.
